mapper.select: SELECT A.PRODUCT_NO , B.PRODUCT_NO , A.PRODUCT_NAME , B.INVENTORY_AMOUNT , A.PRODUCT_PRICE , A.IS_EXPIRE , A.CATEGORY_NO , A.SIZE_NO , C.SIZE_NO , C.SIZE_MM FROM product A JOIN inventory B ON (A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN size C ON (A.SIZE_NO = C.SIZE_NO) WHERE B.WH_ID = 1 AND C.SIZE_MM = (#{size})

SELECT A.PRODUCT_NO , B.PRODUCT_NO , A.PRODUCT_NAME , B.INVENTORY_AMOUNT , A.PRODUCT_PRICE , A.IS_EXPIRE , A.CATEGORY_NO , C.CATEGORY_NO , C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM product A JOIN inventory B ON (A.PRODUCT_NO = B.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN category C ON (A.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE B.WH_ID = 1 AND C.CATEGORY_NAME LIKE CONCAT(#{category})
